structure.unit: B FERTILIZER AND PESTICIDE USE AND APPLICATION

text.section: All hearings required by KRS 217B.010 to 217B.990 shall be conducted in accordance with KRS Chapter 13B.
Appeals may be taken from all final orders of the Commissioner to the Franklin Circuit Court in accordance with KRS Chapter 13B.

law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 130, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 250, sec. 3, effective July 14, 1992.
